title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 679.9 - Training and education
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 679.9 - Training and education

State Regulations

The advisory committees, in
cooperation with the director of the attorneys for children program shall
establish a training and education program for members of the attorneys for
children panels. Such a program may be established in conjunction with bar
associations, local law schools or other competent organizations. The advisory
committees shall make attendance at training programs a requirement for
continued membership on the attorneys for children panels. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
679.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
